mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inquiry(inquiry_upidx, member_idx, code_idx,inquiry_title, inquiry_content, inquiry_state, inquiry_blind) VALUES(0,#{member_idx},#{code_idx},#{inquiry_title},#{inquiry_content},0,0)
